Title: 014: Credit Scoring Models, the Law of Large Numbers, and Model Building with Greg Poppe
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Senior Vice President of Risk Management, Greg Poppe. You will get to know about credit scoring models, learn the law of large numbers and get more insights on model building.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/14
